DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate bioequivalence Commercial Image Capsule ( CIC ) relative Immediate Release Tablet ( IRT ) crizotinib , bioequivalence CIC relative Powder Capsule ( PIC ) crizotinib , lack effect high fat meal pharmacokinetics ( PK ) crizotinib administer CIC Formulation healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence And Food Effect Study Comparing The Commercial Formulation Of Crizotinib To Its Clinical Study Formulations And Commercial Formulation With Or Without Food In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study demonstrate bioequivalence CIC relative IRT CIC relative PIC , lack effect food PK crizotinib healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female nonchildbearing potential subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m^2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) Subjects smoking , evidence disease , condition affect absorption , treatment investigational drug within 30 day , history regular alcohol consumption , use prescription , nonprescription drug dietary supplement within 7 day , blood donation 500 mL within 56 day .
